name: libjpeg-turbo
description: libjpeg-turbo is a JPEG image codec that uses SIMD instructions (MMX, SSE2, NEON, AltiVec) to accelerate baseline JPEG compression and decompression on x86, x86-64, ARM, and PowerPC systems.

jpeg7.description: Emulate libjpeg v7 API/ABI (this makes libjpeg-turbo backward-incompatible with libjpeg v6b!)

jpeg8.description: Emulate libjpeg v8 API/ABI (this makes libjpeg-turbo backward-incompatible with libjpeg v6b!)
